Description.en: If played against a Bargain, +3 points. If played against a Betrayal, -1 point.
If played against a Bargain, +2 points.
If played against a Bargain, +3 points, and an additional +2 points to both players. If played against a Betrayal, -1 point.
If played against a Bargain, +4 points. This card must be played face-up.
If played against a Bargain, +3 points. If played against a Betrayal, -1 point. At any time once played, this card can be flipped face-up to negate a player's Action.
If played against a Bargain, +1 point, and the Bargaining player loses 3 points.
If played against a Bargain, +4 points. If played against a Betrayal, -1 point. This card must be played face-up.
If played against a Bargain, +2 points. If played against the player with the most points, they lose 2 points.
If played against a Bargain, +1 points. If played against a Betrayal, +1 point, and the Betrayer loses 3 points.
If played against a Bargain or a Betrayal, +1 point.
If played against a Bargain, +3 points. If played against a Betrayal, -1 point, and you may take all Action and Final cards of the other player.
If played against a Bargain, +2 points and take all the Action cards of the other player.
If played against a Bargain, +4 points. If played against a Betrayal, -2 points.
If played against a Bargain, +2 points. The other player must also redraw all their Bargain cards at the beginning of the next round.
If played against a Bargain, +3 points. If played against a Betrayal, -1 point. If a player reveals this card during the game, it is flipped face-up, and they must give you all their Action cards.
This card must be played face-up and cannot be moved or interacted with. The player this card is played against must immediately play 2 of their Stance cards.
